author: giacomo
msg: Made the "extra-classpath" extend from the context root if an entry therein is defined in a relative way (read not having a "path.separator" at the first position

author: cziegeler
msg: Renamed filters to transformers, Choosers to Selectors and added mount mail threads

author: dims
msg: This is Part I of the effort to eliminate dependency on javax.servlet.http.*;
1. Object Model contains HttpRequest, so use it as is. Don't type-cast it to HttpServletRequest.
2. Object Model contains HttpResponse, so use it as is. Don't type-cast it to HttpServletResponse.
